Testing Framework
=================

.. note::
   This page is under construction. Check back soon for detailed information about PhenoScope's testing framework.

Unit Testing
------------

This section will provide guidelines for writing unit tests for PhenoScope components.

Integration Testing
---------------------

This section will explain how to write integration tests for PhenoScope.

Test Coverage
-------------

This section will describe how to measure and improve test coverage in PhenoScope.

Continuous Integration
----------------------

This section will provide information about PhenoScope's continuous integration setup.
